## CreateModelInput type

All identifiers and fields used to create a model

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CreateModelInput<Model extends ClientModel<any, any, any, any, any>> = Equal<MinusReadonly<Model['identifier']>, {
    id: string;
}> extends true ? Partial<MinusReadonly<Model['identifier']>> & Omit<MutationInputInternal<Model>, 'id'> : MutationInputInternal<Model>;
```
